@stmserv wrote:

This simple bugfix prevents invaild items from crashing client.

1.Find this in Class8.java:

  1. And replace it with this:

        aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray195[i];
        } catch (Exception e) {
